thread.title: GE Stock: Time to Up the Voltage
thread.title_full: GE Stock: Time to Up the Voltage - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: GE Stock: Time to Up the Voltage
text:
Patience may end up proving to be a virtue at General Electric. And now that activist investor Nelson Peltz has shown up on the scene, patience may not need to be endless.
Mr. Peltz’s Trian Fund Management on Monday announced that it had taken a 1% stake in the industrial giant. Based on the company’s current market value, that holding is worth about $2.6 billion.
Activists typically target a company because they think... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
